data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 31St January, 2022
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today i.e. on Monday, January 31, 2022, have considered, approved and taken on record among other matters :-
1. the Un-Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the 3rdQuarter and Nine Months ended on December 31,2021.
2. the declaration of Interim Dividend @ 15% (Rs.1.50 per equity shares) for the Financial Year 2021-22.
